HUSHPUPPY.raw_line: All the time, everywhere, everything's organs be beatin' and squirtin' and talkin' to each other in ways I can't understand. Mosta the time they probably just sayin' "I'm hungry," or "I gotta poop," but sometimes they talkin' in codes.Feed up time! Feed up!Daddy says, up above the levee, on the dry side, they're afraid of the water like a bunch of babies. They built the wall that cuts us off.They think we all gonna drown down here. But we ain't goin' nowhere.The Bathtub's got more holidays than the whole rest of the world.Daddy always saying, that up in the dry world, they got none of what we got.They only got holidays once a year.They got fish stuck in plastic wrappers, they got their babies stuck in carriages, and chickens on sticks and all that kind of stuff.One day, the storm's gonna blow, the ground's gonna sink, and the water's gonna rise up so high, there ain't gonna be no Bathtub, just a whole bunch of water.But me and my Daddy, we stay right here. We who the earth is for.Way back in the day, the Aurochs was king of the world.If it wasn't for giant snowballs, and the iced age. I wouldn't even be Hushpuppy, I would just be breakfast.Daddy? Feed-up time. Feed-up?Daddy?DADDY!?Kids that got no Mamma, no Daddy and nobody. They got to live in the woods, and eat grass, and steal underpants.Daddy? Daddy?If Daddy don't get home soon, it's gonna be time for me to start eating my pets.My Daddy's coming to pick me up.Everything we still got from Mamma, we keep in my house.Daddy says, the first time she looked at me, it made her heart beat so big, that she thought it would blow up. That's why she swam away.Hi momma.Yes, mamma.That's pretty Mamma.Daddy! Daddy, Daddy!I learned lots of stuff while you gone. If I drink all this here I can burp like a man.How come you wearing a dress?You wearing a bracelet too?I wanna come in your house.I WANNA COME IN YOUR HOUSE!If Daddy kill me, I ain't gonna be forgotten, I'm recording my story for the scientists of the future.In a million years, when kids go to school, they gonna know that once there was Hushpuppy and she lived with her Daddy in the Bathtub.I'm tearing off!I'm tearing off just like my Momma.I hope you do die! And after you die, I come to your grave and eat birthday cake all by myself!Momma!? Momma!? MOMMA!? I think I broke something.Miss Bathsheba! Miss Bathsheba! My Daddy fell down!Daddy could have turned into a tree, or a bug. There wasn't any way to know.The whole universe depends on everything fitting together just right. If one piece busts, even the smallest piece, the entire universe will get busted.What happened to y-Mamma!? MAMMA!?For every animal that didn't have a Dad to put it in a boat, the end of the world already happened. They're all down below, trying to breathe through water.I gotcha!OW!Daddy?Mamma? Is that you?I've broken everything.Strong animals, they know when your hearts are weak. That makes them hungry and they start coming.Back when Daddy used to talk about Mamma, he'd say she was so pretty she never even had to turn on the stove.She just walk into a room and water start to boil.Miss Bathsheba!?For the ones we'd never find, we make a funeral the Bathtub way, with no crying allowed.It wasn't no time to sit around crying like a bunch of pussies.We was gonna build a camp right on top of the Bathtub.We got enough animals to eat until the water goes down.You wanna leave the Bathtub, Walrus?Everything gonna go right back?Daddy says, brave men don't run from their home.The entire universe depends on everything fitting together just right. If you can fix the broken piece, it can all go right back.It didn't matter that the water was gone. Sometimes, you can break something so bad, that it can't get put back together.Mamma!?Mamma where you at!?When you're small, you gotta fix what you can.Raaaaaaaaaaaaahhhh!Man. You think I don't know.You gonna be gone?You gonna leave me alone?Cause if you be gone, I be gone too.I will. Sometimes in the bed I start shaking and can't stop. I got what you got.I ain't gonna be dead?Guns! Guns! Guns! Guns!.....I'm the man.I'm the man!I'm THE MAN!!!!!!!Yea?Strong animals got no mercy.They the type of animals that eats their own Mommas and Daddies.It didn't look like a prison, it looked like a fish tank with no water.Daddy!I don't want your hug!When an animal gets sick here, they plug it into the wall.They're coming for you.Daddy says, if he ever got so old he couldn't drink beer, or catch catfish, that I had to put him in a boat, and set him on fire, so no one could come plug him into the wall.Where we goin'?NO! I ain't running! No!Let me go!You trying to get rid of me! You trying to get rid of me!Why you trying to get rid of me?You is.Yes you can.Don't be sayin' about dying.Not my Daddy.Come on! Come on!Everybody looses the thing that made them, it's even how it's supposed to be in nature.The brave men stay and watch it happen. They don't run.Come on! Keep going!I'm going by my Mamma.Which way are we going?I wanna be cohesive.You can take care of me. Me and Daddy.This is my favorite thing.I can count all the time I've been lifted.I can count all the times I've been lifted on two fingers.I need to go home.You're my friend, kind of.I gotta take care of mine.No crying.When I relax behind my eyes I see everything that made me flying around in invisible pieces. When I look too hard it goes away, but when it all goes quiet, I see they are right here.I see that I'm a little piece of a big, big universe, and that makes things right.When I die, the scientists of the future, they gonna find it all. They gonna know, once there was a Hushpuppy, and she lived with her Daddy in the Bathtub.

WINK.raw_line: Get your pants on, man!Feed up time! Feed up!Share with the dogs.Ain't that ugly over there?We live in the prettiest place on earth.Get out of my way you fat animal!Leave me alone, Man.Go in your house, you wouldn't understand.GO AHEAD!Hushpuppy!? Boss lady!? Hushpuppy where you at!?HUSHPUPPY!? Where are you Boss!?BOSS LADY?Don't you run away from me. I swear to GOD Hushpuppy!You ain't tearing off nothin', I'll bust your ass!Come on!See what happens. See what happens to you!See what you making me do? You're killing me!Get up and now come on.I know y'all with me. Y'all doin' the storm.That's what I'm talking about. Walrus my big man, you staying?You ain't goin nowhere.I'll see you tomorrow Walrus. Lookit there, Winston's with me.What you doing about the storm Winston?Hushpuppy? Where you been?Shut-up!You don't talk!This side is still Wink's house. No toys, and no girl stuff over here.So if I want to come over that side and smack you in the face, that's against the rules. So there's a plus for you.Now come on down here and get in the boat, man.If the water get real high, we gonna float to the top and we gonna bust through the roof and we gonna ride away, okay?You never NEVER take these off. I'm your Daddy, and you do what I tell you to do, because it's my job to keep you from dying, ok? So sit back and just listen to me... Close your eyes and go to sleep. CLOSE YOUR EYES!Why you starin' at me like that? I can't sleep with you starin' at me like that.Listen. You need to understand, you're a kid and I'm a man.What, you scared?Don't be scared, no storm can't beat no Doucet. I'm gonna show you. You watch.I'm'll show you! We Doucets we're not scared of no damn storm.Look at me! Look at me Hushpuppy! Watch me kick butt.Hell yea! I'm right here! I'm right here I ain't going nowhere. AHHHHHH!!!Yo Winston?Edison? Ow-Wee!Some day when I'm gone, you gonna be the last man in the bathtub. You have to learn how to feed your house.Now, stick your left hand in this water, stick it in there.Ok, what you do is you hold your hand steady and you just wait for your fish to come. You gotta ball your fist up, this is your punching hand. Ball your fist up in case you have to whack it when they come up.WHOOOOO YEA! Whooo lord, look what we got. I gotcha. Say "I gotcha!"Yea! Hold him down! Now, you hold it down like this, and whack him good with your fist.Go ahead whack him! You whack him good. Hold him like that and whack him!You OK? That's all a part of it.You wanna try it again?Come on. One more time.Hey partner! Hey Walrus!Little Jo!Peter T, my man! I knew you wasn't gonna leave me man!Peter T, you are a titan! Glad you stayed man! RHHAAAA!Hushpuppy! Did I ever tell you the story of your conception?When me and Hushpuppy's Mamma first met we was so shy, we used to sit around, and drink beer, and smile at each other. One day we was so shy we just napped...Your Momma battered that gator up, and set it to fry....and Hushpuppy popped into the universe maybe four minutes later.I got it under control.Come on lets go! Time to eat! Come on children, feed up time!Nah, that's my beautiful place under there.I got it under control.NO! Hushpuppy--Beast it!Yea! You see what kinda family we got?! We got feeling!Come on fishes, where y'at?I heard that.Nobody's leaving the Bathtub! You don't know nothing!This water gonna kill us here. We gotta do something `bout this. I ain't starvin' to death while them people go grocery shopping up there.Boss, Daddy's gotta take care of something.I'm gonna fix everything back how it was.Hell yeah, we gonna win.Boss, anything go wrong, Walrus is Daddy.You're gonna be the king of the Bathtub, I promise that.Just sit here I'll be right back.Peter T, don't hold onto me, hold onto the boat. You gonna be fine.Peter T, you hold the trip-line.Just don't pull `til I say.You can do it. I have complete faith in you.Peter T hand me the-Peter you didn't drop the trip- line?AHH! Get off me woman! I'm trying to save the BathtubJean Battiste, get the trip line!NOW BOSS!GUUAAAHH!God damn!What you doing!?What the hell's wrong with you!You wanna throw things? Come on! I can do that too. You want to play that game? Let's throw stuff!Come on! Come on!AAAAH!!! COME ON! COME ON!AAAAAHHHHH!!!!! YEAH!! COME ON!Hey. No crying. Don't you cry man. Don't you cry!HEY! Don't cry damn it!Shit.Come on get a drink.This counts as I'm sorry for a whole buncha things. Lord.What? No!I ain't gon' leave nothing.Hushpuppy, that is not how it works.No man. That's just a side effect of being a stupid little girl.No. You? No! You gonna live a hundred years more. You know what, show me the guns.Show me them guns man.Show me the guns! Guns! guns! guns! guns! guns!Guns man, give to me! Guns! Guns!Ooooo, Hushpuppy you the man. Who the man?Who the man!?TELL ME LOUDER WHO THE MAN!!!!YOU THE MAN, RIGHT?!Fuck this table!I gotta lay down hear? I gotta be strong. Don't be scared.What?Come here.Lay down.Hey.You ain't the one who's sick.We ain't going nowhere!Get your hands off of her! I'm gonna kill you! Let her go!Don't eat that.Whoa whoa whoa, not in front of my kid. Stay, Hushpuppy.I don't need nothing from you! You keep your hands off her! I don't need nothing from y'all! Let me go!Boss. Let's go.Make sure you put her somewhere good ok?No!I ain't trying to get rid of you.No. Hushpuppy... I can't take care of you no more.Daddy's dying!My blood is eating itself. You know what that means?Everybody's Daddy dies.Yes, your Daddy!I didn't want you to watch that, ok? You understand?Walrus, get me home.Naw, that waits.Alright fatso, breathe some air.Real good.No crying, you hear?
